name: Reforesting, average national softwood forest, INW
description: Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet undergone a formal validation process. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology. Some data extrapolated from similar processes.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Region specific data on the level of resource consumption during stand establishment is limited.  Estimates for these values were developed using a limited set of published data and through direct inquiries of forest nursery managers.
Cost and fuel consumption factors were developed as a rate per seedling and were then multiplied by the number of planted seedlings per unit area (hectare or acre) to determine costs and fuel consumption rates per unit area.
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: US Inland West including Montana, Idaho, and eastern Washington

flow.name: Reforesting, average national softwood forest, INW

exchanges.description: For crew transportation only - actual planting is manual
